meanings.definition: Make (an action or process) easy or easier.
meanings.sent1: Using a calculator facilitates solving math problems quickly.
meanings.sent2: Having a map facilitates finding your way in a new city.
meanings.sent3: Carrying an umbrella facilitates staying dry in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Good lighting facilitates a cozy atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: A good teacher facilitates learning by explaining concepts clearly.

meanings.sent1: Teamwork facilitates completing projects on time.
meanings.sent3: Coffee facilitates waking up early for work.
meanings.sent5: Practice facilitates improvement in any skill.
